channel.title: Apache in GSoC on ASF Community Development
channel.description: Recent content in Apache in GSoC on ASF Community Development

item.title: Apache in GSoC
item.description:
This is a place for collecting information about GSoC activities each year for historical tracking. Your help filling it out would be appreciated.
